item.title: Living Memory
item.description: A multisensory experience for one person. This research-based performative experience asks questions about the memory of a place and about memory's place in culture, as well as individually in each of us. What does it mean to remember that, which has been submerged in the past? How important is physical pace in the preservation of a memory? Can our memories, like plant species, disappear altogether if they lose their habitat?
